title.en: Prayer of Truthful Words to Pacify the Fear of War

text.en: Victorious Maitreya, sublime and noble Avalokiteśvara,
text.en-trans: jamchen gyalwa pakchok chenrezik

text.en: Ferocious king Hayagrīva, Jetsün Tārā, and the rest –
text.en-trans: trogyal tamdrin jetsün drolma sok

text.en: Buddhas, the mere sound of whose names dispels all fear;
text.en-trans: tsen tsam töpé jikpa kün selwé

text.en: Compassionate sources of refuge, pray grant me heed.
text.en-trans: kyabné tukjé daknyi gong su sol

text.en: In this time when individuals experience an oceanic surge
text.en-trans: tsöden nyikma nga dö semchen nam

text.en: Of negative karma and jealousy – the age of fivefold decadence and strife –
text.en-trans: lé ngen trakdok tso chen dolwa lé

text.en: As intense suffering, fighting and quarrelling oppress us,
text.en-trans: tabtsö dukngal drakpö narwa na

text.en: Pray burn it all in the fires of your compassionate wisdom.
text.en-trans: yeshe tukjé zhuk kyi kempar dzö

text.en: Shower the nectar of love
text.en-trans: zhedang mepung barwé drowa la

text.en: Upon those who fan the flames of hatred.
text.en-trans: jampé dütsi char chen pab né kyang

text.en: Bless them to recognize one another as parents,
text.en-trans: pentsün pama tabü dushé kyi

text.en: And thereby usher in auspiciousness and happiness.
text.en-trans: dekyi tashi pelwar jingyi lob

text.en: May the mischievous elemental spirits
text.en-trans: gang gi gyü la zhukpé kechik gi

text.en: That enter the minds of beings
text.en-trans: lona lhamin zhindu gyur jepé

text.en: And instantaneously transform their hosts into warring titans,
text.en-trans: jungpo dukpé tsok nam tsarché né

text.en: Never hold sway in this region again.
text.en-trans: chinché chok dir gyuwar magyur chik

text.en: May all who have died in battles, fighting and wars
text.en-trans: yulngor shiwé semchen tamché kyang

text.en: Immediately give up their indulgence in destructive action, cause and effect,
text.en-trans: deng né lé ngen gyundré künpang né

text.en: And, having taken birth in the pure realm of Sukhāvatī,
text.en-trans: dewachen du dzü té kyé né kyang

text.en: Lead all to that same buddha realm.
text.en-trans: tamché zhing der tripar dzé du sol

text.en: May all beings have long, healthy lives,
text.en-trans: kyegu tamché tsering nemé ching

text.en: Be free of quarrels and strife, live according to the ten virtues,
text.en-trans: tabtsö kün zhi gewa chu la chö

text.en: And experience timely rains and bountiful harvests;
text.en-trans: charchu dü bab lo chuk taktu lek

text.en: And may the auspiciousness of the environment and beings increase exponentially.
text.en-trans: nöchü tashi pelwar dzé du sol

text.en: May these pure, vast prayers be accomplished
text.en-trans: chönyi rangzhin nampar dakpa dang

text.en: Through the compassion of the Guru, Yidam, and Three Rare and Sublime Ones,
text.en-trans: chöchen gyundré luwa mepa dang

text.en: Suchness, which by its very nature is utterly pure,
text.en-trans: lama yidam könchok tukjé yi

text.en: And the appearance of things, the undeceiving nature of cause and effect.
text.en-trans: namdak mönlam gyachen drubpar shok
